title: The Amara Diamond Grandeur Set: A Contemporary Haaram and Jhumka Ensemble
materials: 18K Rose Gold with Premium Quality Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones. Expertly crafted with Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting sheen and enhanced durability. Rhodium plating for enhanced shine.
features: A stunning contemporary take on the classic Haaram design. The necklace features a cascading arrangement of floral and paisley-inspired motifs. Each piece is meticulously crafted with detailed openwork and prong settings to maximize the sparkle of the CZ stones. The matching Jhumkas echo the necklace's design, creating a harmonious and elegant set.
colors: Rose gold and sparkling white CZ stones. The warm rose gold provides a subtle contrast that accentuates the brilliance of the stones
creating a modern and sophisticated look.
occasions: and special occasions. A perfect statement piece for the modern bride or any woman who desires a touch of elegance with a contemporary twist. Also perfect for events like Sangeet
description: This Amara Diamond Grandeur Set is a true masterpiece of modern jewelry design. The combination of premium materials, skilled craftsmanship, and a unique design makes it a valuable addition to any jewelry collection. Its versatility allows it to be worn for both traditional and modern occasions, making it a treasured heirloom for generations to come. The premium CZ stones give the look of real diamonds at an affordable price.
